articles.title: Naspers slumps more than 14% following Tencent's shock drop - News24
articles.description: Naspers and its subsidiary Prosus, which holds a 29% stake in the Chinese tech giant Tencent, came under pressure after big losses in Tencent on Monday.
articles.content:
• Naspers lost more than 14% on Monday, while Prosus was down 13%. 
  • Chinese tech giant Tencent came under pressure following a report that it is facing a record fine in China.

articles.title: NASA's DART asteroid-slamming mission builds on tiny diamond-tipped tool tech - Space.com
articles.description: A diamond-tipped nanoindenter tool has helped researchers measure the hardness and elasticity of asteroid samples, aiding in preparations for NASA's DART mission.
